post.body: what is so funny about this is that I suddenly got many new followers as this was happening proving quality does still rule :)
that too is freedom on twitter :)
this is why I am addicted to twitter - great discussions with opposing views expressed freely rule! & open to all :)
google plumbling ques. - I have & there is amazing info out there - for free!
whew! glad you didn't ck "authority" I never wld have made it into the in crowd :)
that's okay; I get why you do what you do :)
re: ...authority; I agree; from my ubb perspective, I enjoy the level playing field that social media offers; hope it lasts :)
beautiful photo; makes me miss my berkeley days :) enjoy a great town; go to Skates on the Bay for best view of all!
I agree! Automated social = anti-social; down with auto responses, auto- dm's; real ppl are soooo much more interesting :)
Wordle Rocks :) thnx for the fun!
re: dm/sorry you' re ill, read my blog = balanced opportunist :)
coverage of this envir. disaster has been amazing; fascinated with all of the connections you have made & twittered. #coalash
RT@JesseNewhart @jilliancyork: Israeli Air Raids in Gaza Kill as Many as 200 People. http://tinyurl.com/7xumpc How does this help anything?
RT@randulo @uberbabyboomer quality has little to do with "potential reach" so I wouldn't worry :) w/folks like you out there, no worries :)
RT@warrenss @MackCollier Isn't the whole pt of SM, the democratization of ideas that empowers CGM & the little guy. Look at #motrinmoms YES!
As a low # of followers twitterer,does not feel good to think that my numbers are = to the quality of my thoughts. thnx @MackCollier et al
The number of followers has NOTHING to do with quality of ideas, value of your voice; also tired of being asked to RT req. for more & more!
RT: @LakersTickets Two words: Go Lakers!!! + Forever !
RT@BreakingNewsOn French President Nicolas Sarkozy & EU Foreign Policy Chief call for immediate halt to Gaza violence.(Why isn't USA too?)
RT@PragueBob RT @khaledalhourani Israeli missiles target Gaza #gaza (PB: Both parties need to end this old "feud", finally) (very sad story)
